src.auth.auth

Blueprint login endpoints

src.auth.login()

Endpoint for the login screen

This endpoint acts as the homepage for the site. It contains the login form for both admin users and non-admin users.

Raises:

Exception – Prints the error and returns a redirect to this page.

Returns:

  • redirect – If the user that is logging in has ‘admin’ set as true, a redirect to views.adminPanel is returned.

    If the user that is logging in has ‘admin’ set as false, a redirect to views.profile is returned.

    If the login failed, a redirect to this page is sent.

  • render_template – Ships the html for index.html.

src.auth.logout()

Endpoint for logging the currently logged-in user out.

Returns:

Redirects to auth.login.

Return type:

redirect
